identified-content.object.title: Burren, The: A Companion to the Wildflowers of an Irish Limestone
Wild Plants of the Burren and the Aran Islands (Book)

abstract.p: Correction of July 9 list of traveler resources accompanying article about Burren in County Clare, Ireland; Burren: A Companion to the Wildflowers of an Irish Limestone Wilderness by E Charles Nelson was published for Conservancy of the Burren by Samton Ltd; Nelson's Wild Plants of the Burren and the Aran Islands was published by Collins Press (S)

block.p: A listing of resources for travelers on July 9 with an article about the Burren in County Clare, Ireland, misidentified the publisher of ''The Burren: a Companion to the Wildflowers of an Irish Limestone Wilderness'' by E. Charles Nelson. It was published for the Conservancy of the Burren by Samton Ltd. (Dublin), not by the Collins Press (London). The name of the publisher for a second book, ''Wild Plants of the Burren and the Aran Islands,'' also by Dr. Nelson, was omitted. It was the Collins Press.

Charles Nelson. It was published for the Conservancy of the Burren by Samton Ltd. (Dublin), not by the Collins Press (London). The name of the publisher for a second book, ''Wild Plants of the Burren and the Aran Islands,'' also by Dr. Nelson, was omitted. It was the Collins Press.
